name: FINAL FANTASY XIV: A Realm Reborn

execute.command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR/prefix"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\ FANTASY\ XIV\ -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn

echo -e "<FINAL FANTASY XIV Config File>

<Cutscene Settings>
CutsceneMovieOpening 1" > "$GAMEDIR/prefix"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\ FANTASY\ XIV\ -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn/FFXIV.cfg

echo -e "<FINAL FANTASY XIV Boot Config File>

<Version>
Browser 1" > "$GAMEDIR/prefix"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\ FANTASY\ XIV\ -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn/FFXIV_BOOT.cfg

task.name: set_regedit
task.description: Adding Registry Entries for FFXIV Launcher

content:
game:
  appid: 39210
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    description: Setting up wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- execute:
    command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR/prefix"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\
      FANTASY\ XIV\ -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn
- execute:
    command: echo -e "<FINAL FANTASY XIV Config File>\n\n<Cutscene Settings>\nCutsceneMovieOpening
      1" > "$GAMEDIR/prefix"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\ FANTASY\
      XIV\ -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn/FFXIV.cfg
- execute:
    command: echo -e "<FINAL FANTASY XIV Boot Config File>\n\n<Version>\nBrowser 1"
      > "$GAMEDIR/prefix"/drive_c/users/$USER/My\ Documents/My\ Games/FINAL\ FANTASY\
      XIV\ -\ A\ Realm\ Reborn/FFXIV_BOOT.cfg
- task:
    description: Adding Registry Entries for FFXIV Launcher
    key: HideWineExports
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    type: REG_SZ
    value: Y
system:
  env:
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
